show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #54 Jason Wrich "Beef, Bees and Bitcoin"
subtitle: #54 Jason Wrich "Beef, Bees and Bitcoin"
summary:
This week USMC Vet Jason Wrich joins me for a conversation that you will remember about the Angora Rabbit fur business, farming Chinchillas how bad ass bees are and his direct consumer grass fed beef business.
